description:
Rei and Nikaidou are going to provide the demonstration board commentary for the final Kisohu Championship match between Yanagihara and Shimada. As might be expected of Yanagihara, who has reigned as the Kishou champion for many years, most of the reporters and staff members who show up for a get-together on the eve of the match are old friends of his. Meanwhile, Shimada, the challenger, has an uncomfortable “away game” feeling, but he’s determined to win his first title.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 焼野が原① / 焼野が原②
